description: You've probably never heard of the Rev. Pat Conroy, the chaplain for the US House.
title: The House chaplain's pointed coronavirus message
title_page: The House chaplain's pointed coronavirus message - CNNPolitics
maintext:
(CNN) You've probably never heard of the Rev. Pat Conroy, the chaplain for the US House.
But you -- and all of us -- should listen to Conroy's wise words in the prayer he used to open the House chamber on Tuesday morning.
Here the key part:
"While some states begin to loosen precautionary measures, give wisdom and good judgment to America's citizens. Please inspire the governors in this country to make wise judgments mindful of the important balance of concerns for health as well as economy."
Conroy's words landed as several southern states with Republican governors -- led by Georgia -- begin the process, as early as this week, of reopening businesses in hopes of restarting stalled economies.
